metadata.title: Bending Stress in Strength of Materials
metadata.subject: Strength of Materials

content.description: Two diagrams are shown. The first depicts a straight rectangular beam section with external bending moments 'M' applied at both ends. The internal stress distribution is indicated, with a neutral axis and a variable 'y' representing distance from it. Labels B, E, C, D are placed on the beam's edges. The second diagram shows a rectangular beam bent into a curve, with an arrow pointing towards a central point labeled 'R', indicating the radius of curvature. Internal stress is also indicated in the bent section.
